Package at.fhj.iit

Class Shake

java.lang.Object
at.fhj.iit.Drink
at.fhj.iit.Shake
public class Shake
extends Drink
Class represents a Shake, which containts 2 fruits and a liquid

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected int index  

    Fields inherited from class at.fhj.iit.Drink

    name

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Shake​(java.lang.String name)
    Creates a Shake object with given name and declares the fruits Array with the size of 2 Additionally we are creating a "listofLiquids" Array List to save the liquids we use for the Shake.
